title.rendered: Why sell your Amazon business? With Jim Mann of Thrasio

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 40:54 — 37.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 40:54 — 37.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Jim Mann is the Director of Acquisitions for UK of Thrasio, The world’s largest acquirer of Amazon and E-commerce brands. He started selling on Amazon in 2014 until 2020 and is now with Thrasio, he’s going to give us insight on why it’s a good time to sell your Amazon business sooner rather than later.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The reasons to sell your business.
  • The benefits of selling now.
  • Other reasons to get out of Amazon.
  • Pricing and valuation post-Covid.
  • How to value your business.
